nodes.text: The B-R6 Prototype Droid was a tripedal prototype battle droid designed in the Research and Development sector of the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. It was armed with two powerful blaster cannons on its arms. During the Cold War, it was destroyed by Imperial forces that invaded the factory.

The B-R6 Prototype Droid appears as an enemy in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it can be found in the Research and Development area of the Okara Droid Factory—a Heroic area in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
